Author: Alexithymia115
Text: This right here. This relapse has manifested into atypical anorexia with some VERY orthorexic tendencies. I try very hard to get exercise eat a lot of protein, not low restrict and take vitamins. I'm not perfect I mean I'm still DEFINITELY eating several hundred calories below my activeness TDEE but I don't fast because I know it leads up binging and purging which SUCKS ASS been there never want to go back.

Author: chezpajama
Text: Try to balance nutrition & satiety with your ED.  I have a lot of shitty health habits and I’m in full on restrict mode, but I don’t fast because it makes me crazy and I don’t EC stack.  I eat nutritionally dense foods. Lots of veggies (fiber is your friend!), a bit of grain, various sources of protein (animal & plant). I also supplement my electrolytes.  Most recently I’m trying to kick diet soda and stick to tea and sparkling water. It helps a lot.  Yoga practice also keeps me on track and stabilizes my mood / contributes to my overall mental health.  Again, I am by no means a paragon of healthy weight loss but I’m trying to be less awful to myself this time around.
